net.pravian.bukkitlib.command
Class BukkitCommandHandler<T extends org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin>

java.lang.Object
  net.pravian.bukkitlib.command.BukkitCommandHandler<T>

public class BukkitCommandHandler<T extends org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin>
extends Object

Represents a handler for executing commands.

Method Detail

setSuperPermission

public void setSuperPermission(String superPermission)
Sets the super permission for this command handler.

Optional: Defaults to [lowercase pluginname].*

The super permission indicates an override for players. Any sender who has this permission will be able to run all commands executed by this CommandHandler provided the source type is correct.

Parameters:
superPermission - The super permission to set.

getSuperPermission

public String getSuperPermission()
Returns the super permission set for this command handler.

Returns:
The super permission set.
See Also:
setSuperPermission(java.lang.String)

setCommandLocation

public void setCommandLocation(Package commandLocation)
Sets the location of the commands this CommandHandler is handling.

Required!

This method must be called before calling handleCommand(CommandSender, Command, String, String[])

Parameters:
commandLocation - The location of this command.

Optional: Defaults to Command_

Example: Command_testing.java

enableCommandCaching

public void enableCommandCaching()
Enables command caching for this handler..

When command caching is enabled, commands will only be instantiated once. After instantiation, the command will be cached and the BukkitCommand#run(Command, String, String[]) will be called consecutively for each execution. After each instantiation, commands can reset to their original state by overriding BukkitCommand.reset().

Note

: Commands will only be instantiated when their first execution is called.

Note

: The cache may be cleared by using clearCommandCache()

clearCommandCache

public void clearCommandCache()
Clears the command cache.

See Also:
enableCommandCaching()

getCachedCommand

public BukkitCommand<?> getCachedCommand(org.bukkit.command.Command command)
Returns a cached command.

Parameters:
command - Command to retrieve.
Returns:
The cached command / null if it hasn't been cached yet.

handleCommand

public boolean handleCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                             org.bukkit.command.Command command,
                             String commandLabel,
                             String[] args)
Handles the execution of a command.

Parameters:
sender - The CommandSender executing the command.
command - The command being executed.
commandLabel - The exact command being used.
args - The arguments to the command.
Returns:
true/false depending if the command executed successfully.
See Also:
BukkitCommand.run(CommandSender, Command, String, String[])
